fieldUpdates.description: to update the owner when GCE CSWI Created
fieldUpdates.name: CSWI Owner Update

fieldUpdates.description: Set SR Date Closed to Today
fieldUpdates.name: DateClosed
Populate Status monitor to open time

fieldUpdates.formula: IF ( ( Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c) > 0, FLOOR( (Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c))*24*60 + FLOOR( 24 * ( (Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c) - FLOOR((Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c)) ))*60 + ( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c) - FLOOR((Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c) - FLOOR((Work_Restart_Date__c - Work_Stoppage_Date__c)) ),8)) ),0))+ AgeBTWS_WR__c , 0)
fieldUpdates.name: Update AgeBTWS&WR

fieldUpdates.description: Update Read Only General Record Type
fieldUpdates.name: Update Read Only General

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(MOD(TODAY()- DATE(1900, 1, 7), 7), 0, TODAY()+2, 1, TODAY()+2, 2, TODAY()+2,3, TODAY()+2, 4, TODAY()+4, 5, TODAY()+4, 6, TODAY()+3,null)
fieldUpdates.name: Update SR Estimated Completion Dt
Update SR General GCC To General
Update SR General To General GCC
Update SR VOC GCC To VOC
Update SR VOC To VOC GCC

fieldUpdates.description: update the date when status is changed from open to monitor
fieldUpdates.name: update date of monitor

fieldUpdates.formula: IF( ISBLANK ( PRIORVALUE( total_days_in_monitor__c )),0,PRIORVALUE(total_days_in_monitor__c)) + ROUND(MOD((now() - open_to_monitor__c)*1440,60),0)
fieldUpdates.name: update total number of days

rules.description: Check if a Service Request is past due . if today's date is > than the customer due date Service Request is past due .

rules.fullName: Notify Owner when SR Owner is changed
rules.description: Send a notification to the owner when the owner of the SR has been changed.
rules.formula: ISCHANGED( OwnerId__c ) && not (ispickval(Status__c ,'Closed')) && LastModifiedBy.Alias != 'sadmin' && ( RecordType.Name <> 'GCE Support Request') && NOT(ISPICKVAL(SR_Type__c,'Defect'))

rules.description: email to the owner when the SR is closed by the anyone.
rules.formula: and( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), ispickval(Status__c,'Closed'), LastModifiedBy.Alias != 'sadmin', LastModifiedBy.Alias !='AeroPDM', $RecordType.Name != "GCE CSWI Support Request", RecordType.Name <> 'GCE Support Request', NOT(ISPICKVAL(SR_Type__c,'Defect')) )

rules.description: email to the creator when the SR is closed by someone different to the creator.
rules.formula: and( ISCHANGED( Status__c ), CreatedBy.Id != LastModifiedBy.Id, ispickval(Status__c,'Closed'), LastModifiedBy.Alias != 'sadmin', LastModifiedBy.Alias !='AeroPDM', CreatedBy.Alias != 'sadmin', $RecordType.Name != "GCE CSWI Support Request", RecordType.Name <> 'GCE Support Request', NOT(ISPICKVAL(SR_Type__c,'Defect')) )

email to the creator when the SR is updated by someone different to the creator.
rules.formula: CreatedBy.Id != LastModifiedBy.Id && LastModifiedBy.Username != 'sfdc.admin@honeywell.com' && LastModifiedBy.Username != 'aeropdm.apiuser@honeywell.com' && not(ispickval(Status__c,'Closed') && CreatedBy.Alias != 'sadmin' ) && ( ISCHANGED(Customer_Due_Date__c )|| ISCHANGED(Status__c))&& RecordType.Name <> 'GCE Support Request' && NOT(ISPICKVAL(SR_Type__c,'Defect'))

rules.booleanFilter: (1 AND 2 AND 3 AND 6) OR (4 AND 5 AND 1 AND 2)
